reuters.title: AUDIO/VIDEO <AVA> TO GET EXPENSES FROM DIXONS
reuters.body: Audio/Video Affiliates Inc said it will receive an undisclosed amount from <Dixons Group PLC> in connection with the termination of Cyacq Corp's 92.50 dlr per share tender offer for Cyclops Corp <CYL>. The company said the amount from Dixons is in lieu of reimbursement expenses for the Cyacq tender. Citicorp <CCI> was the other partner in Cyacq. The payment was in connection with Dixons' previously -announced agreement to increase its tender price for Cyclops to 95.00 dlrs per share, Cycacq's ending of its competing bid and the ending of litigation between the parties. Reuter 
